bill_title: appropriate funds for the provision of internet access wiring to assisted living centers in South Dakota.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to appropriate funds for the provision of internet access wiring to assisted living centers in South Dakota. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. There is hereby appropriated from the general fund the sum of forty-four thousand, six hundred forty-nine dollars ($44,649), or so much thereof as may be necessary, to the Department of Social Services, for the purpose of providing internet access wiring to non- profit assisted living centers in South Dakota, as defined by § 34-12-1.1. Centers receiving funds for internet access wiring will be expected to utilize community sources for the purchase of hardware and other necessary materials. Section 2. The secretary of the Department of Social Services shall approve vouchers and the state auditor shall draw warrants to pay expenditures authorized by this Act. Section 3. Any amounts appropriated in this Act not lawfully expended or obligated by June 30, 2001, shall revert in accordance with § 4-8-21. 500 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.021 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.
